''''' Melodious Chant''''' is the third act of the [[Tribal Chronicles]] [[A Prayer for Blessings, Told to Crested Peaks]]. In order to unlock this quest line, the player must have reached [[Adventure Rank]] 40, and have completed the {{Quest|The Rainbow Destined to Burn}}.
